### Homework Work Flow

1.  Follow the link to your homework assigment
    +  the links are on the README file for each unit repository
    +  link your GitHub account to your student identifier (1st assignment only)
3.  `Accept` the assignment
4.  Follow the link to your new, private homework repository
5.  Clone the repository to your local computer 
    +  Click `Code` and copy the repo link
    +  Open RStudio and create a new project with Git version control using the repo link
6.  Do the homework assignment
7.  Use the `Git` pane in RStudio to push out your new files and edits to the online repo by the due date
